name: openspeedtest
description: OpenSpeedTest is a self-hosted internet speed test tool with a responsive web interface. It measures download, upload, and latency through your browser without plugins or dependencies.
features: Speed Testing: Measure internet download and upload speeds directly through your web browser without plugins.
Latency Measurement: Test network latency and ping times to assess connection quality and responsiveness.
Self-hosted Solution: Run your own speed test server for internal network testing and bandwidth monitoring.
Responsive Interface: Clean, mobile-friendly web interface that works across all devices and screen sizes.
Real-time Results: View live speed test progress with real-time graphs and instant result display.
Multiple Protocols: Support for various testing protocols to ensure accurate measurements across different network conditions.
Historical Data: Store and compare speed test results over time to track network performance trends.
Custom Configuration: Adjust test parameters including duration, file sizes, and server endpoints for specific needs.
API Integration: Programmatic access to speed testing functionality for automated monitoring and reporting systems.
Network Diagnostics: Additional network diagnostic tools including jitter measurement and packet loss detection.
Multi-server Testing: Test against multiple servers simultaneously to identify the best connection paths.
Privacy Focused: No external dependencies or data collection, ensuring complete privacy for network testing.
